profile:
RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL CUSTOM WINDOW COVERINGS - Your one-stop-shop for custom window coverings

Give a new life to your windows
Whether you’re updating your decor or fitting out a brand new home let Shades4u provide the finishing touches and designer flair with their stunning range of custom-made window coverings. No matter how big your windows or doors, or what shape, Shades4u can custom make your window coverings for a perfect fit, every time.

Free Consultation & Free Installation
We come to your home with our blinds and samples so that you can mix and match your new blinds to complement your home and make an informed decision.

Professional Service
We ensure that our service will always cater to all of your hopes and expectations, so that they are not only met, but exceeded beyond anything throughout the entire process.

Quality Products
We set quality standards within the window coverings industry. We diligently perform more tests and checks to ensure our products withstand the demands of everyday use.

SHADES
Duo-Glide (Zebra Blinds) - Twin Shades - Solar Shades - Sheer Shades - Roller Shades - Natural Shades and Drapes - Cellular Shades 

BLINDS 
Vertical Blinds - Horizontal Blinds - Fauxwood and composite blinds - Wood Blinds

SHUTTERS
Wood Shutters - Composite Shutters


LOCATIONS
Fergus, Elora  (Head Office) - Waterloo - Cambridge - Kitchener - Guelph - Ottawa - Brampton - Listowel - Drayton - Mount Forest - Arthur

profile:
Your Needs. Your Style. Our Expert Guidance.
Window coverings play a major role in the entire look and feel of your home. At Gotcha Covered, we’re committed to helping you get the most out of every single room in your house. We proudly offer custom window treatments, including blinds, draperies, shutters, and more that can take your home from drab to fab!

Whether you want to improve the style and function of your living room, are seeking energy efficient window treatment options, or want to create a cozy atmosphere throughout your home, our expert consultants can help. We’ll come to your home for a free design consultation to take a look at your specific needs and work to understand your goals. From there, we’ll help you find the perfect window covering solution, customized to your preferences and your budget.


    
WHAT ARE YOUR NEEDS?
Addressing Any Problems You May Have
Gotcha Covered has been helping our clients come up with window treatment solutions for years. We understand that some steps of the process may be stressful. Unexpected struggles can arise if you’re looking for a specific product. Regardless of what your needs are, you can count on us to help.

Once we identify what your needs are, we can get your project moving and provide you with the solutions you’re looking for. No matter what your budget may be, we promise to find products in your price range that you’ll love for your home.

We are happy to address and resolve your needs, even if:
You need inspiration
You are on a budget
You want a designer look in your home
You have a specific window challenge
You’ve never purchased before
You’re looking for basic blinds
You’re ready to get started


OUR SERVICE PLEDGE
At Gotcha Covered, we appreciate and respect our clients. We pledge to provide high-quality products and services that will exceed your expectations and add beauty and value to your environment. We are committed to maintaining our relationship with our clients long after the sale.


Check us out here: 
https://www.facebook.com/Gotcha-Covered-North-Kitchener-and-Waterloo-450733142048843/
https://www.youtube.com/user/GotchaCoveredHQ
